# Quickstart

Shows how to benchmark Nelder-Mead vs BFGS on noiseless BBOB


```{r}
library(rcoco)

s = cocoOpenSuite("bbob")
r1 = runSuite(optfun1)
r2 = runSuite(optfun2)
cocoCloseSuite(s)


```
